description: Dominic Dietrich and Ed Dawes are joined by former Derby striker Malcolm Christie to discuss the Rams hitting rock bottom of the Championship.
title: Derby County podcast: Rams lack 'hunger' to stay up
title_page: Derby County podcast: Rams lack 'hunger' to stay up - BBC Sport
